question: Will Lionel Messi win Ballon d'Or 2021?
description:
This is a market on whether Lionel Messi will win the 2021 Ballon d’Or [Golden Ball] Award. 

The trophy is recognising the best footballers in the world by the French news magazine France Football. The annual ceremony of the award is scheduled to take place on 29th November 2021. 
If Lionel Messi is awarded Ballon d'Or at the ceremony, this market will resolve to "Yes", otherwise it will resolve to "No".

Please note, there is a chance that France Football will honour also the best player of 2020 (the ceremony was cancelled due to the pandemic) or might name it "Ballon d'Or 2020 & 2021". For this market to resolve to "Yes", Lionel Messi has to be awarded with any of them.

The resolution source will be the list of the laureates at France Football’s website, https://www.francefootball.fr/ballon-d-or/palmares/.

If the award isn't announced by December 5, 2021, the market will resolve 50/50.

question: Will the USDC Market Cap be above $36.5 billion on November 28th?
description:
This is a market on whether USD Coin (USDC) will have a market cap higher than $36,500,000,000.00 on the resolution time of November 28th 2021, 11:59 AM ET. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if USDC has a market cap larger than 36.5 billion dollars, and “No” otherwise. 

The resolution source for this market will be the market cap on Coinmarketcap’s respective listings for USDC, https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/usd-coin/, on the right hand side next to "Market Cap."

question: Will France or the USA report a higher 7-day COVID-19 case average per capita on November 30?
description:
This is a market on whether France or the United States of America will report a higher 7-day COVID-19 case average per capita on November 30, 2021.

This market will resolve on data aggregated by Our World in Data, specifically, the 7-day rolling average of COVID-19 cases for France and the USA, with Metric "Confirmed Cases", Interval "7-day rolling average", and the Relative to Population checkbox checked, which is available at https://ourworldindata.org/explorers/coronavirus-data-explorer.

The resolution source will be reviewed on December 1st at 11 PM ET and - if the data for November 30 will not be available then - checked again every 12 hours, until the final check on December 5, 11 PM ET. 
If the data is not available by then, this market will resolve based on other credible sources for the day of November 30. 

If France has a higher 7-day COVID-19 case average per capita for the day of November 30, 2021, the market will resolve to "France." If the United States of America has a higher 7-day COVID-19 case average per capita for the day of November 30, 2021, the market will resolve to "USA." If the averages per capita are the same, the market will resolve 50/50.
--------------------

OWiD dataset uses the most recent official numbers from governments and health ministries worldwide. Population estimates for per-capita metrics are based on the United Nations World Population Prospects. 

Here: https://github.com/owid/covid-19-data/tree/master/public/data one can find a detailed list of all our country-specific sources.

question: Will @Snowden tweet count be over 6,700 on December 1?
description:
This is a market on whether a total amount of tweets on the @Snowden Twitter account, as indicated by the resolution source (https://tweetdeck.twitter.com/), on the resolution date of 6:00 PM ET, December 1, 2021. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the resolution source indicates 6,700 or more tweets have been posted from the @Snowden Twitter account, by the resolution date and to "No" otherwise.

Should the resolution source be unavailable at the time of resolution and for six hours more, this market will resolve 50-50.

According to the resolution source, at the time of the creation of this market on November 21, 2021 the tweet count for @Snowden was at 6,632.

----------------------------------
Additional Market Information:

- To see the official cumulative tweet count on the resolution source, search the resolution source for the verified @Snowden Twitter account, and check the cumulative numbers of tweets under the “TWEETS” field.

- The number by which the total tweets at expiration exceeds the Baseline may not equal the number of tweets actually posted over that time period, in light of numerous factors, including but not limited to the fact that the account's total tweets upon launch of the market may differ from the Baseline, tweets may be deleted prior to the expiration of this market, and specialized tweets such as quotes, retweets, replies, promoted tweets, may or may not be included in that total.

- Neither Edward Snowden, nor any authorized user of the account in question, need to be the author of any such tweets, nor must any authorized user maintain control of the account.

- Neither Edward Snowden, nor any authorized user of the account in question, need to be the author of any such tweets, nor must any authorized user maintain control of the account.

question: Will there be another (1071st) NFL Scorigami in November 2021?
description:
In sports, a Scorigami is a scoring combination that has never happened before in a sport or league's history. 

In NFL's history, there have been 1070 unique scores. 
The most recent Scorigami for an NFL game occurred on November 21, 2021, when the Indianapolis Colts defeated the Buffalo Bills by a score of 41–15.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if at least one more NFL Scorigami will occur after the market inception date, November 22, 8 AM ET, and before the market resolution time, November 30, 11:00 PM ET.
Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is an official NFL website (https://www.nfl.com/scores/), however other sites tracking Scorigamis will be helpful (https://nflscorigami.com/, https://twitter.com/NFL_Scorigami)

description:

If the Villareal CF win, the market will resolve to “Villareal CF.” 

If the Manchester United win, the market will resolve to “Manchester United.”

question: Will Manchester United F.C. announce their new manager by December 2?
description:
If on or before December 2, 7 PM ET, Manchester United Football Club announces who will be the new manager of their first soccer team, this market resolves to "Yes".

If no such announcement is made by the club's officials by the resolution date this market resolves to "No".

NOTE: If the announcement states that the new coach is temporary until another one is found, this market will resolve to "No". Already appointed interim manager Michael Carrick will not be considered for the purposes of this market.

The verified media sources will be used for the resolution of this market, especially the official website of Manchester United F.C. (https://manutd.com/) and @ManUtd Twitter account.

question: UEFA Champions League: Will the goal difference in Chelsea v. Juventus be greater than 1?
description:
In the upcoming UEFA Champions League soccer game between Chelsea London and Juventus F.C., scheduled for November 23:

If the goal difference is greater than 1, this market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the goal difference is 1 or lower, this market will resolve to “No”.

If this game is not completed by November 29, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.

---------------------

Please note, the goal difference is the absolute difference between goals counted for each of the teams at the end of the game.

For example, if the final score is 0:1, 2:1, 5:4... - then the goal difference equals 1;
if the final score is 3:1, 2:0, 5:3... - then the goal difference equals 2;
if there is a tie, the goal difference equals 0, etc.

question: Will Lebron James be suspended for 3 or more games?
description:
This is a market on the length of Lebron James’ suspension from the NBA, following his closed-fist hit on Isaiah Stewart. This market will resolve to “Yes” if he is suspended for three or more games, and “No” otherwise. The market timeframe is from the time of his closed-fist hit on Isaiah Stewart to December 2, 2021, 12:00 PM ET. 

The resolution source will be any official NBA press release concerning Lebron James’ suspension, typically published to https://pr.nba.com/ and/or https://pr.nba.com/tag/nba-suspensions/page/1. If no suspension is announced by the resolution date, December 2, 2021, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to “No”.

question: Will Lebron James play against the New York Knicks on Tuesday?
description: This market will resolve to “Yes” if Lebron James plays for the Los Angeles Lakers in their game against the New York Knicks, scheduled to take place at 7:30 PM ET on November 23. This market will resolve to “No” otherwise. This market concerns whether he will play at any point during the game, namely if he is on the bench the entire game, it won't be sufficient to resolve the market to "Yes."
